alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 3:23PM MST until December 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of two to 8 inches above 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph creating areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Far Northwest Highlands and Chuska Mountains. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands
